name: sophie's quest
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2019 Submission. "Only One"

Only one:

  • Button
  • Objective
  • Enemy
  • Room
  • Dog
  • Poo

Help Sophie on her quest to take a dump in Rob's room! Inspired by a true story.

Made with HaxeFlixel

Source code available here.

Happy Birthday, Rob.
